results.title: Developmental phenotypic and transcriptomic effects of exposure to nanomolar levels of metformin in zebrafish.
results.text_hl: Both extended and short term duration did however have an impact on locomotor activity of @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@, and several genes involved in neurological and cardiovascular development were differentially expressed after exposure to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. The changes seen in behavior, gene expression and @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@morphological abnormalities@@@ caused by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure should be examined further in future studies in order to assess their potential @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ health implications as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prescriptions continue to increase worldwide.

citations.NLM: Phillips J, Akemann C, Shields JN, Wu CC, Meyer DN, Baker BB, Pitts DK, Baker TR. Developmental phenotypic and transcriptomic effects of exposure to nanomolar levels of metformin in zebrafish. Environ Toxicol Pharmacol. 2021 Oct;87():103716. PMID: 34311114

results.text_hl: Additionally, in terms of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ control, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ works well in the early treatment stage.

results.title: Pregnancy outcomes among women with polycystic ovary syndrome treated with metformin.
results.text_hl: There have been no major @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@CD@@@ in the 63 live births or @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@CD@@@ by sonography in the seven fetuses <or=13 weeks.

results.title: Metformin in management of pregnant insulin-independent diabetics.
results.text_hl: The mothers of 3 infants with @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@congenital abnormalities@@@ had received @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ only during the last trimester of their pregnancy.

results.title: Locally delivered 1% metformin gel in the treatment of smokers with chronic periodontitis: a randomized controlled clinical trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: There was greater decrease in mSBI and PD and more CAL gain with significant @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@IBD@@@ fill at vertical defect sites treated with SRP plus locally delivered @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@, versus SRP plus placebo, in smokers with generalized @DISEASE_Chronic_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D055113 @@@CP@@@.

citations.NLM: Rao NS, Pradeep AR, Kumari M, Naik SB. Locally delivered 1% metformin gel in the treatment of smokers with chronic periodontitis: a randomized controlled clinical trial. J Periodontol. 2013 Aug;84(8):1165-71. PMID: 23130655

results.title: Efficacy of varying concentrations of subgingivally delivered metformin in the treatment of chronic periodontitis: a randomized controlled clinical trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: A total of 118 @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@IBDs@@@ were treated with 0.5%, 1%, or 1.5% @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ gel or placebo gel.

results.title: Efficacy of 1% Metformin Gel in Patients With Moderate and Severe Chronic Periodontitis: A Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial.
results.text_hl: Radiologic assessment of @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@intrabony defects@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@IBDs@@@) and percentage defect depth reduction (DDR%) was done at baseline and 6- and 9-month intervals using computer-aided software.
